channel.title: Omg y will no1 help me (d scimi dsapears when i log out and in)
channel.description: well i have posted this 3 times and no1 can help me, every time i weild a dragon scimitar and then log out and log bak in the dragon scimitar has disapeared can anyone fix this for me (by that i mean can anyone tell me how to fix it?) plz i have been waiting 4 hour sfor this can someone put me out of my mind and tell me how to fix it then you would have saved a 15 year old from dieing of frustration plz plz plz i really need help with this im baffled.
